sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_email_3e1b52246f4c0200e04fd15eae3ee4b3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>se_GetProjectManagerEmail</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[//
// Get the project manager's email for an approved Centralized Procurement Requests.  
//
function se_GetProjectManagerEmail() {

	try {
		var gdt = new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue();
		gs.log(gdt +" current.number " + current.number, "se_GetProjectManagerEmail");

		if(current.variables.u_item == null ||  current.variables.u_item == "" ){
			project_name = current.variables.u_program;
		}
		else{
			project_name = current.variables.u_item;
		}
		
		var projectRecord = new GlideRecord("u_cbiit_biz_purchase_program_info");
	
		if (projectRecord.get(project_name)) {
			if (projectRecord.u_federal_lead.email.toString().length > 0) {
				email.addAddress("cc", projectRecord.u_federal_lead.email, projectRecord.u_federal_lead.first_name + " " + projectRecord.u_federal_lead.last_name);
			}
		}
	} catch (ex) {
		se_LogError("ex", ex.toString());
	}
	
}
se_GetProjectManagerEmail();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mcsweeneyra@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-12 18:03:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3e1b52246f4c0200e04fd15eae3ee4b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>se_GetProjectManagerEmail</sys_name><sys_package/><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_3e1b52246f4c0200e04fd15eae3ee4b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wuye@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-09-27 15:06:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="item_option_new"><item_option_new action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><attributes/><cat_item display_value="CBIIT Purchase Request">892a893f6fabf500250e6bbeae3ee4aa</cat_item><category/><choice_direction>down</choice_direction><choice_field/><choice_table/><create_roles/><default_html_value/><default_value/><delete_roles/><delivery_plan/><description/><display_title>false</display_title><do_not_select_first>false</do_not_select_first><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><field/><global>false</global><help_tag>More information</help_tag><help_text>* For general items such as office supplies, office equipment, FedEx/UPS, etc., select 'Project: Cost Bucket Operations' * To search for a specific project, type '*' (wildcard character) and some characters of the project name. For example, for the Project: Cost Bucket - Operations project, type '*cost' to display all projects that contain the word 'cost', and then select the correct project from the list shown. * This request will be directed to the Project Manager of the project selected for approval. If the correct Project Name is not selected, the Project Manager will reject the request and a new request will need to be created with the correct Project Name.
